alert.note: Alert for Adams; Brown; Pike (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 08 at 3:09AM CDT until July 08 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of west central Illinois, including the following areas, Adams IL, Brown IL and Pike IL. Portions of northeast Missouri, including the following areas, Knox MO, Lewis MO, Marion MO, Monroe MO, Ralls MO and Shelby MO. * WHEN...Until 8 AM CDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Thunderstorms early this morning may train over some of the same regions which recently received locally heavy rainfall Wednesday night into early Thursday morning.
